title: 2016 is coming!
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\sqrt{x + 672} + \\sqrt{y + 672} + \\sqrt{z + 672}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x,y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be positive reals whose sum is 2016. If the maximum value of the expression above is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"M"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", what is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"M^2 ?"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We will use Cauchy Schwarz Inequality,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(1 + 1 + 1)((x + 672) + (y + 672) + (z + 672)) ≥ (\sqrt{x + 672} + \sqrt{y + 672} + \sqrt{z + 672})^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3(x + y + z + 2016) ≥ (\sqrt{x + 672} + \sqrt{y + 672} + \sqrt{z + 672})^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"12096 ≥ (\sqrt{x + 672} + \sqrt{y + 672} + \sqrt{z + 672})^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt{12096} ≥ (\sqrt{x + 672} + \sqrt{y + 672} + \sqrt{z + 672})"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So maximum value is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"M = \sqrt{12096} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", thus "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"M^2 = 12096 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2016 is coming!
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x_{1}^{2016} + x_{2} ^{2016} +\\cdots+ x_{2016}^{2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x_{1}, x_{2},\\ldots, x_{2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are the roots of the equation "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^{2016} - 2016x - 2 = 0,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" then find the value of the expression above."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^{2016} - 2016x - 2 = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^{2016} = 2016x + 2 .... (1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Putting "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = x_{1}, x_{2}, ....., x_{2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" repeatedly, and add them, we get"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x_{1}^{2016} + x_{2} ^{2016} + ........ + x_{2016}^{2016} = 2016(x_{1} + x_{2} + ..... + x_{2016}) + 4032"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Using Vieta,
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x_{1} + x_{2} + .... + x_{2016} = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So the value of expression is
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x_{1}^{2016} + x_{2} ^{2016} + ........ + x_{2016}^{2016} = 4032"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Some other solution...
By "},{"type":"text","text":"Newton's sums","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^{2016}_1+ x^{2016}_2+ \ldots + x^{2016}_{2016} = S_{2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S_{2016} + S_{2015} \cdot a_{1} + \ldots + S_1 \cdot a_{2015} +2016 \cdot a_{2016} = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_1, a_2, a_3, ... a_{2014}=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S_1 = -a_1 = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S_{2016} + S_{2015} \cdot 0 + \ldots + 0 \cdot a_{2015} +2016 \cdot a_{2016} = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S_{2016} + 2016 \cdot a_{2016} = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S_{2016} + 2016 \cdot (-2) = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S_{2016}  = 4032"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2016 is coming!
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" f(x) = x^{2016} + 2^3 x^{2015} + 3^3 x^{2014} + \\cdots + 2016^3 x + 2017^3 "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{1}, a_{2},\\ldots , a_{2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are the roots of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(x) = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then find the last three digits of the constant term of the polynomial whose roots are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 - a_{1}, 1 - a_{2}, \\ldots , 1 - a_{2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note that all the coefficients including the constant are perfect cubes."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P(x)=\sum_{k=0}^{2016}(2017-k)^3x^k"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Then the polynomial with roots "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1-a_k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1\le k\le 2016"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Q(x)=P(1-x)=\sum_{k=0}^{2016}(2017-k)^3(1-x)^k"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"But now we see the constant term of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Q(x)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is clearly"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Q(0)=\sum_{k=0}^{2016}(2017-k)^3=\sum_{k=1}^{2017}k^3=(2035153)^2 mod1000 = 409"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"mention","content":[{"type":"text","text":"@Otto Bretscher"}],"attrs":[{"profile":"https://brilliant.org/profile/otto-jxcphj/"}]},{"type":"text","text":" , how is the solution ?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" y = 1 - x  \rightarrow x = 1-y "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Substituting in the given equation, "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" f(y) = \sum_{r=1}^{r=2017} r^{3}(1-y)^{2017-r}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
The constant term in the binomial expansion of the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" r^{th} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" term is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" r^{3} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Thus, the constant term(C) is given by
C =  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sum_{r=1}^{2017}r^3 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Now,  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sum_{r=1}^{n}r^3 = \left(\dfrac{(n)(n+1)}{2}\right)^2 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Putting "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" n = 2017 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
C = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"  \left(\dfrac{(2017)(2018}{2}\right)^2  = \left( 2017 \times 1009 \right)^2 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" C \equiv  \left( 2017 \times 1009 \right)^2 \pmod{1000} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" C \equiv  \left( 17 \times9 \right)^2 \pmod{1000} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" C \equiv  153^{2} \pmod{1000} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \therefore C \equiv 23409 \pmod{1000} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Thus, the last 3 digits of C are 409."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
